author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3305: Change initial sizes in DoubleArrayTrie; put tail-split index into center of full int range -> bigger tries possible (in future)

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3305: Optimize reallocation strategy in DoubleArrayTrie and TokenInfoDictionaryWriter. For DoubleArrayTrie also record the largest index, so the file does not contain useless tailing 00s (unfortunately the effect is not so big). Also remove useless copying of ByteBuffers in DoubleArrayTrie.write() by keeping a reference to the backing ByteBuffers.

author: erick
msg: Added notes for SOLR-1931, speeding up the LukeRequestHandler
